scene_description_enriched: A figure, likely a man, is depicted in profile, engaged in digging with a shovel. He wears a tunic with blue stripes and hose. The background is a reddish-pink with scattered white dots. In front of him, a series of green and white blocks are arranged, suggesting a construction or landscaping activity. The scene is framed by a decorative border.
scene_interpretation: This image likely represents a scene from the Old Testament, possibly depicting Adam toiling in the Garden of Eden after the Fall, or a general representation of manual labor, which was a common theme in medieval art to illustrate the consequences of sin or the virtues of hard work.
